title: AWS re:Invent 2025 - Accelerate development with Kiro's new agentic AI capabilities (DVT228)
title_cn: AWS re:Invent 2025 - 使用 Kiro 全新智能体 AI 功能加速开发 (DVT228)
abstract: Excited about the launch of Kiro powers? Join this breakout session to learn how AI agents turn into experts instantly by dynamically loading powers to accelerate full-stack development and deployment. Hear from our expert and partners and see demos of powers in action.
abstract_cn: 对Kiro powers的发布感到兴奋吗？加入这个分组会议，了解AI代理如何通过动态加载powers立即成为专家，以加速全栈开发和部署。聆听我们的专家和合作伙伴的分享，观看powers实际应用的演示。
